title: BRIEF-Yes Capital, Part Of Yes Bank Promoter Group, Sells 1.8% Shareholding In Bank - Statement
text:
BRIEF-Yes Capital, Part Of Yes Bank Promoter Group, Sells 1.8% Shareholding In Bank - Statement

Stock Markets 1 hour ago (Sep 26, 2019 21:30)

© Reuters. BRIEF-Yes Capital, Part Of Yes Bank Promoter Group, Sells 1.8% Shareholding In Bank - Statement Sept 26 (Reuters) - Yes Bank Ltd says: * YES CAPITAL, PART OF YES BANK PROMOTER GROUP, SELLS 1.8% SHAREHOLDING IN BANK - STATEMENT * YES BANK SAYS PROCEEDS FROM STAKE SALE TO BE USED FOR PRE-PAYING OUTSTANDING NCDs SUBSCRIBED BY FRANKLIN TEMPLETON * YES BANK SAYS WILL FULLY PAY FRANKLIN TEMPLETON BEFORE NCD MATURITY DATE OF OCT 2020 * YES BANK SAYS PROMOTER HOLDING IN BANK AFTER STAKE SALE IS AT 13.4% Further company coverage: YESB.NS

BRIEF-Yes Capital, Part Of Yes Bank Promoter Group, Sells 1.8% Shareholding In Bank - Statement
